attributes.action: Introduce affordable pet care lessons for soon-to-be pet owners.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Hundreds, perhaps thousands of animals in the UK each year are being neglected due to owners simply not knowing the correct way to care for their pet.
We propose that the government put forward a scheme to provide lessons on how to care for your animals, at an affordable cost. 
This would greatly improve the lives that animals have and in turn, improve the owners relationship with their animals.
